definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
lit. oily and shiny to the point of reflecting (idiom)/lustrous

sentences.chinese: 它们在烛光中油光发亮。

sentences.english: This foaming cream cleanser could minimize the pores and control shine without feeling tight.
sentences.chinese: 这款泡沫洁面霜可以缩小毛孔减少油光且没有紧绷感。
他把头发弄得油光光的。

sentences.english: Ultimate comfort without feeling greasy, not oily.
sentences.chinese: 极致舒适无油腻感，不泛油光。

sentences.english: This did not add oiliness , in fact it seemed to keep my skin looking matte.
sentences.chinese: 它不会让我的皮肤看起来油光，甚至有哑光的感觉。

sentences.english: Youre fur is sleek and glossy, you're well-fed — what happened?
sentences.chinese: 皮毛光滑，油光锃亮，吃得饱饱的，发生了什么事？

sentences.english: The old-fashioned chairs were very bright, and the walnut-wood table was like a looking-glass.
sentences.chinese: 老式椅子油光锃亮，那张胡桃木桌子象面穿衣镜。

sentences.english: It is beyond the mark to present glossy to show fat, possible stimulation must grow dark sore.
sentences.chinese: 呈现油光便显示过分油腻，有可能刺激得长暗疮。

sentences.english: A light Aloe &Apricot infused conditioner to repair the hair without any heaviness or greasiness.
sentences.chinese: 芦荟和杏子用以修护头发，令头发轻盈及油光不再。

sentences.english: Oil blobs and oil sheen are seen in the waters of Chandeleur Sound, La.
sentences.chinese: 钱德尔勒尔群岛水中可见的油污和油光。

sentences.english: The truck spun round on the oily road, and the driver was helpless to control it.
sentences.chinese: 卡车在油光光的路上打滑，司机无法控制车。

definition: lit. oily and shiny to the point of reflecting (idiom)/lustrous
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
